newsitem.title: UK: Biocompatibles in deal with Wesley.
newsitem.headline: Biocompatibles in deal with Wesley.

text.p: Biocompatibles International Plc, a maker of medical devices, said on Tuesday it had entered into a distribution agreement with Wesley Jessen Visioncare Inc of the United States.

Under the deal with Wesley Jessen, the world's leading company in premium and speciality contact lenses, will distribute ProclearTM, including ProclearTM Torics, and Proclear CompatiblesTM contact lenses in key European markets.

The agreement runs for a minimum of seven years and covers the markets in France, Germany, Italy, Spain, Austria and Switzerland -- which together represent around 17 percent of the total world contact lens market.
Biocompatibles will continue to market its own eyecare products directly in the UK and North America.
Biocompatibles said in a statement that the relationship provided it with the potential to access the remainder of Wesley Jessen's worldwide distribution network in 50 other countries.
Wesley Jessen has worldwide sales of around $250 million.
